custom-action.name: buildwhiteblocknetwork_1
custom-action.description:
Build a BlockChain Network.
Possible parameters are: - WhiteBlocMasterHost (required): Master Node of your Whiteblock Network Default value is "Host of the master Node ". - WhiteBlocRpcPort (required): RPC port of the whiteblock node Default value is "RPC port of the whiteblock node". - WhiteBlocRpctoken (required): RPC token of the whiteblock node Default value is "RPC token of the whiteblock node". - ProxyName (optional): name of the neoload proxy Default value is "name of the neoload proxy". - TypeofBlochacin (required): value possible :Ethereum, Syscoin, Rchain, EOS, Monero, NEM, Fabric, Quorum, or Custom Default value is "Type of BlockChain Network". - DockerImage (required): Docker Image of the node Default value is "Docker Image of the node". - NumberOfNodes (required): Number of nodes to generate in the network Default value is "Number of Nodes". - TraceMode (optional): enable loggin details : true: enable ; false : Disable Default value is "enable logging ".
